text.more: This is a social network of italian renaissance artists and their patrons. This network shows the connections between artists and patrons who created and commisioned artwork that is related to Julius Caesar. This network shows that the majoity of these connections involve Catholic popes as they were trying to identify themselves with Julius Caesar's legacy.
text.intro: This is a social network of italian renaissance artists and their patrons.
text.title: Renaissance Artwork Patronage Network
